short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Multiplayer extension for Chrome that will help you quickly track any page you want.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A Multiplayer extension for Chrome that will help you quickly track any page you want. 
You can add the url for the current page you are working on from the extension or in case of url like Google doc, Sheet, Notion page, Linear ticket, you can actually automatically create a new Topic base on their content. 
Sooner, we will be able to do so for any other link.
